mapper.insert: insert into online_class values(#{online_num},#{commu_num},#{online_title},#{online_content},#{online_time},#{online_file},#{online_thumbnail},now()) on duplicate key update online_num=#{online_num}, commu_num=#{commu_num}, online_title=#{online_title}, online_content=#{online_content}, online_time=#{online_time}, online_file=#{online_file}, online_thumbnail=#{online_thumbnail}, online_regdate=now()
mapper.select: select IFNULL(count(*),0) cnt from online_class where commu_num=#{commu_num}
select online_thumbnail from online_class where online_num=#{online_num}
